author: PlayStation
description:
https://store.playstation.com/en-us/product/JP1368-PPSA27182_00-GGAC2PSAPP000000

Gal Guardians: Servants of the Dark is out now on PlayStation 5 and PlayStation 4!

The newest title in the Gal Guardians series of gothic-inspired 2D action-adventure games greatly expands the setting from a single castle to the entirety of the Demon Realm, and further evolves the gameplay into a true metroidvania adventure. Starring two new characters with different playstyles, Kirika and Masha, players can switch between them in order to fully explore the vast areas and take down the dangerous enemies in their path.

PlayStation 5 physical edition coming June 12th 2025.

#ps5 #ps5games #ps4 #ps4games
title: Gal Guardians: Servants of the Dark - Launch Trailer | PS5 & PS4 Games

Spirit of the North 2 will be available on May 8th

Journey as a little fox across the wide, beautiful Nordic landscape, on a quest to restore the lost guardians and save the world - alongside your raven friend.

Is this the real life? Or is this just fantasy? 🥹

No escape from the fight now— Verdansk is coming back. Return to the map that started it all on April 3 in Call of Duty: Warzone 🪂

author: PlayStation
description:
https://store.playstation.com/en-us/concept/10008983

Check out the brutal action of KIBORG, the fast-paced action rogue-lite.
30 April will be available to Play!

KIBORG is a relentless rogue-lite beat’em up where you enhance your body with new cybernetic implants each run. You’ve been sent to the worst prison in the galaxy for crimes you didn’t commit. Death won’t provide an escape, but a violent reality show may offer a way out.

#ps5 #ps5games #ps4 #ps4games #kiborg
title: Kiborg - Release Date Trailer | PS5 & PS4 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
https://store.playstation.com/concept/10012079

Embark on a perilous journey across a realm forsaken by the gods and devastated by an arcane cataclysm. Accompanied by a hardy crew, you must trade, fight, and explore your way to success as the leader of a traveling company in Vagrus, an award-winning turn-based post-apocalyptic fantasy RPG. Available on Playstation on March 31.

#ps5 #ps5games #ps4 #ps4games
title: Vagrus - The Riven Realms - Launch Trailer | PS5 & PS4 Games

"Get out!" is an original game derived from the "Very Bad Dreams" Franchise released on PS VR2
Pre-order "Get Out" to receive Dean's Dream DLC for free.
An horror experience like no other!

Exclusively developed for the PS VR2 with well-worked haptic capabilities (B-Haptics compatible).
